claimEpochRewards(bool).details: Claims the rewards of a given epoch. If autocompound is true it re-stakes the tokens harvested, otherwise withdraws them

distributeRewards().details: Admin function to distribute rewards after a given epoch. It operates in a push basisGiven this operation mode it has serious limitations given the loops. A better implementation is to create a pull based system*

getFactionArtifactsBalance(uint256).details: Returns the current number of staked artifacts per faction

getMothoraGame().details: Returns the address of the Mothora Game Hub Contract

getPlayerArtifactsBalance(address).details: Returns the current number of staked artifacts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMothoraGame(address).details: Updates the address of the Mothora Game

stakeArtifacts(uint256).details: Stakes artifacts in the absorber, only active accounts can stake

stakeTokens(uint256).details: Allows active accounts only to stake tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakeArtifacts(uint256).details: Unstakes artifacts from the absorber. Any existing account can unstake

unstakeTokens(uint256).details: Allows any existing account to unstake (including frozen accounts, which cannot stake anymore)
